title: Database size
name: Database:Size
description:
Large databases can negatively impact your production site, and slow down
things like database dumps. The size reported is the data and index size
combined.
success: The size of the database  `{{db}}` is less than {{max_size}}MB, currently **{{size}} MB**.
failure: The size of the database `{{db}}` is over {{max_size}}, currently **{{size}} MB**.
warning: The size of the database `{{db}}` is nearing {{max_size}}MB, currently **{{size}} MB**.
remediation:
Find out what tables are the largest and see what can be done to make them
smaller.
